Focus, discipline and repetition is followed by mastery and success and in all shapes and sizes
April 15, 2016, Ralph Larsen was a client of Michael’s

Ralph Larsen is highly professional and considerate, and an insightful technical recruiter. During the time he and I were in communication about a position that fit my profile precisely, he maintained good communication each and every day. Unlike most technical recruiters, Ralph made sure I was aware of all communication about the position, what to expect, and the timeline. If I did need such services in the future, I would surely reach out to him first as he gave a lasting professional impression.Best regards,Michael S. Lockwood

Business Analyst at DriveTime
January 29, 2016, Kyle was a client of Ralph Larsen’s

Ralph helped me secure my most recent position with a software company. It was a very big move for me and my family, as the job required us to move cross-country. That said, what made the process enjoyable was Ralph's positive attitude and attention to detail. He was very professional in conversation and quick to follow-up with answers to questions I had. I would highly recommend Ralph's services to anyone in search of a great customer experience!  -Kyle Everhart
